dcterms:creator: W. Choi
C. Pantofaru
S. Savarese
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 17 video sequences captured in an office. Various human poses such as sitting, standing, and walking are included.
dcterms:title: Kinect Office dataset

dcterms:creator: W. Choi
C. Pantofaru
S. Savarese
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 18 video sequences collected by a Kinect mounted on a PR2 robot with a horizontal perspective. The robot was moving inside a building, and challenges like illumination variations and complex background are included.
dcterms:title: Kinect Mobile dataset
